subject: Re: Share your stories for the press...?
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
For whom do you write?  Where can we read some of your previously
published material??  Based on your question, I'm assuming you aren't
looking to do the field of EVP/ITC or other paranormal research any
favors.  What is your intention???

How about focusing on something positive?  That would be a nice change
of pace from the media.  I don't think you'll find anyone here that is
willing to help perpetuate the negative stereotypical views on our
research or other nonsense that is a distraction from the fact that
there are valuable EVP/ITC advances taking place.

Margaret

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "dmikolay" <dmikolay@...> wrote:
>
> Anyone ever get an elemental, demon, or otherwise "inhuman" voice?
Anyone hear from 
> someone with a dire warning? Anything else otherwise weird? I am a
journalist and would 
> LOVE to interview you about it!
>
